website_summaries.verdict: A soft, warm hoodie that's available in stylish colors and is both functional and affordable.
pros: Lightweight yet warm, this hoodie features a comfortable slip-on fit and has a pocket just like hoodies for people
Fleece material is soft and durable
Available in several bright and neutral colors and in different sizes
Price falls on the lower end of the range
cons: Tends to fit too tightly on breeds with deep chests

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Got an XL for my 60lb bully pup. Fits perfectly and has some stretch aswell. Really soft and adorable. The hood is HUGE but works fine. Its very long and covers his back all the way to his butt/tail but angles underneath to expose his privates to let him pee.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: The measurements were accurate and they fit great. Very nice quality fleece too
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I've been looking for my dogs. The measurements were accurate and they fit great. Very nice quality fleece too! I got the XXL for my Dane Mix (~100-105lbs ish) and the XL for my Heeler Mix (~80-85lbs ish).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pits have a barrel sort of shape and it works beautifully on her
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is very soft and has just enough stretch to work on a variety of body shapes. My pit loves it and the hood is big/long enough to shield her from inclement weather. Pits have a barrel sort of shape and it works beautifully on her. I would say the color is not true to the photo for the purple, at least. It's more a mauve than a true purple. One thing - that ring pictured is just sewn on to the fleece with regular thread and not reinforced. Unless you have the world's most beautifully behaved dog who NEVER pulls (in which case they probably heel without a leash anyhow), don't use that. We sure didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: and 21" long - got her the medium and it fits great. It fits pretty perfectly but if she was ...
customer_reviews.text: My pup is 25 lbs, about 20" chest, 14" neck, and 21" long - got her the medium and it fits great. It fits pretty perfectly but if she was an inch bigger in the chest it would probably be TOO snug. Love this!! It is so perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hatzenbeller

customer_reviews.title: Got the XS and it fits excellent. The pocket makes great auxiliary storage for a ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 pound Miniature Pinscher loves it. Got the XS and it fits excellent. The pocket makes great auxiliary storage for a few waste bags.
customer_reviews.author: GeoCalBear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! Size small in my photos.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9.5lb Morkie. It's been a challenge finding size small jackets that will cover his entire back (10" long). Everything usually goes halfway up his back. This hoodie is the perfect fit, and is a nice thick fleece that will keep him warm. Not having sleeves will keep his hair from matting under his arms. I highly recommend this hoodie. When up, the hood is quite large. But that shouldn't deter you. It's also easy to get on and off -in case you've never tried one without Velcro or buttons. Update-- one year later this hoodie is still like new. Great quality! I bought 3.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew V.

customer_reviews.title: Read the comments for sizing before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoodie twice -- one in a Large and one in a Medium. The medium fits my 26 lb dog better -- she has a chest girth of around 22" and I order L for sweaters almost always but this hoodie is very loose and LONG!! I use the L sized sweater for indoor wear, but when I let her go outside to potty I have to roll up the bottom because I'm worried it'll get dirtied. The medium fits perfectly; it's a tiny bit snug but because it's fleece it does stretch out. :) She gets a lot of compliments wearing her hoodie!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ziraphale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, exactly what our pooch needed to keep her warm while her hair grows back after surgery! The hood is a little big and flops over her head when she runs around, but I think I can alter it to prevent this. She only has three legs, so her hobble makes her head really bounce around, giving the hood a little more motion when she's on the move. But she cozy and warm and SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is very inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a small as my dog fell pefectly inbetween those measurements. (He’s a 16-18lbs terrior mix). This shows up and looks like it would fit a chihuahua that weighs all of 5lbs. So i order a large next.... this thing is huge to the point that its almost dragging on the floor. So i get a medium since why shouldnt it fit? This is still super small and only slightly larger than the small and doesnt even fit over his shoulders.... waste of my timeeeee.

customer_reviews.title: Which makes putting it on nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this sweater. I purchased the XL for my 60lb Belgian Malinois. It’s a loose fit. Which makes putting it on nice and simple! The hood is pretty big.. I’m glad I didn’t get the large like I originally was going to because the neck hole is just big enough. I’m afraid I’d be challenging to put on if it was any smaller. He can pee just fine which was another concern. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend going up a size from what you think your ...
customer_reviews.text: These hoodies run a bit small. I definitely recommend going up a size from what you think your dog wears. Other than that, great quality and very soft fleece material. It is well made and the pictures don't really do it justice. I am returning mine and getting a larger size. For reference, my dog weighs 60-65 pounds and needs a size XL.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Felsen

customer_reviews.title: Large size difference
customer_reviews.text: My 50lb pittie loves this jacket! It’s super soft and very well made and keeps her warm even in the snow. My only complaint is the size difference between the L and XL (pictured). The L rode up almost instantly and fit very snug all over making her uncomfortable. The XL, as you can see, is too large on her but not overly so. The arm holes leave her chest pretty exposed... If they just made a size in between it would be a perfect jacket!
customer_reviews.author: ohu812

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND practical
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute. Like an actual person hoodie...down to design and fabric. Much softer and cozy than I expected. It's usable indoors when it's a bit chilly for my sensitive chi. The only drawback...for my lively dog...is that the hood keeps going forward over her head a bit when out walking. No biggie. The O-ring on the back is as good as any on a harness.
customer_reviews.author: Molly HowardTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but very cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Definitely runs small - if you are on the high end of the size measurements, just size up. My normally medium-sized dog fit the measurements for a medium sweater, but it's too tight - basically tight like a Thunder shirt, so it's not terrible but I think she would be more comfortable with a looser fit. Nevertheless, it seems pretty well made and is very soft since it's fleece. We've been using it for walks in single-digit Chicago winters and I think it helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and cozy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is absolutely perfect!! Bought XL for my one year old pit mix, approx. 55 lbs, and it fits her great. Long enough to cover her whole back and keeps her extra cozy. I haven't taken it off of her for a few days because she really seems to love it. I bought two XL in two different colors and both have an opening for leash attachment in the the back rather than the o-ring. Fine by me since I have to use a harness over the hoodie anyway. Great product! Plan on getting a couple more once they're back in stock in her size.
customer_reviews.author: bootgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hoodie. It's soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hoodie. It's soft and warm. I got my pit/lab mix a large and it was a good fit since she's only 45 pds. i love that they run long on the back but short on the bottom for them to pee without wetting the sweater. If you have a boxer or german shepherd an Xl and up would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.CalvTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... my heavier 8 year old heeler - it fit perfect - so I measured for my other 2 thinking ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an x-large for my heavier 8 year old heeler - it fit perfect - so I measured for my other 2 thinking that they would fit like a charm (1 large and 1 medium). This is one of those products that you can't depend on the size chart. And disappointingly at this time of year (Christmas) this is the first company that did not honor return with free shipping. So a 9 dollar item cost me 6 dollars to return. I did order another x-tra large to replace. Hoping the x-tra large fits like the first :-(
customer_reviews.author: JodiLeck

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issues.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I ordered larges for my dogs. The correct item arrived but they were much to small. I returned them, purchased the XL. A different item arrived and they are HUGE. The first ones I received were the ones with the leash hook on the back. The second ones had an opening to hook their leash through the hole into their collars. Not impressed. The quality seems nice but sizing is ridiculous. It's not worth going through the hassle to exchange again. I guess to big is better than too small.
customer_reviews.author: ddmendenhall

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I typically have a difficult time finding warm clothes for my sphynx, he's very long. I'm SO glad I decided to try this! Definitely buying a couple more
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! My pups love these!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were adorable and wanted to try them for my pups. My boxers have very deep chests so I was worried about the fit, but they fit great! The dogs actually really love them! The only downside is that my boxers are short and stout, so I have to roll the shirt up to their chest when they go outside to go to the bathroom, otherwise they’ll get ‘wet’. The length is fine for my American bulldog puppy. These wash up really well also! I’m super happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: BrandyInLove

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Needed a jacket to protect against cold for a taller-than-average but skinny (9 lb, elderly) Pomeranian who just got a very short haircut. We put it on when it arrived and haven't taken it off. It fits perfectly, seems well made. Very cute and keeps her warm.
customer_reviews.author: Boaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Fit! My dog is 40 lbs and the large fit her perfect. Large was not too tight for her. It is long but the length ends right at her tail. Will buy in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but runs large. Color differs from photo.
customer_reviews.text: Positives: The round arm holes are easier for my long-legged standard poodle than other dog sweaters with sleeves. Seems well made. Negatives: The XXL is way too large for her and the color is nowhere near the photo (I ordered purple and received a dusty pink color). I ordered the XXL because a previous XL in a different brand was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE! Runs small so read the reviews, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO CUTE! Glad I read the reviews because it runs small. My 18-pound schnoodle fills every bit of the medium. This is not cotton and has no stretch. It’s fleecy polyester and will be a lot warmer than a sweatshirt though. The cute factor is off the chart! Bright red color with adorable hood and pocket. I’ll actually use the hood in the rain because this fabric will dry in a snap. Maybe store some extra poo bags in the pocket. Absolutely a great buy for the price. Buzz approves!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Huge range in sizing between L and XL
customer_reviews.text: We are reluctantly keeping this because we love the color and styling, but the range between sizing on this is huge. We initially purchased the XL for our pup because we wanted a slightly loose fit, and she was absolutely swimming in the fabric. So we returned it and purchased the L, which unfortunately fits her like sausage casing. We're going to try to stretch out the fabric, but I wish we didn't have to. Another note is that the purple color in the product photo is pretty inaccurate; I thought we were going to get a rich, saturated purple, but in real life, the purple is more of a medium pink/purple. Still pretty, but not what the photo represented.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Missing o-ring
customer_reviews.text: Did not have o-ring, as advertised in photograph. My dog is very stocky, and though the chest size fit—it was way too long, and hung over her butt. Fortunately, Little Red Riding Hound’s grandma tailored it shorter for her, and it fits much better, now. We also added some elastic to the hood, so it doesn’t fall over her face.
customer_reviews.author: H. Coffill

customer_reviews.title: Not a fake review
customer_reviews.text: Dashund/Chihuahua/ Jack Russell mix 17lbs Finally something long enough to actually cover her full spine. I thought it was going to be like an actual sweat shirt material. But the softy side is both inside and outside. The hood is a bit big. But that's normal for her. It does have a D ring attached to the sweater, I would not attach a leash to clothing for her though. If you have a slightly longer than average pupper i would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me :-)

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy.  XXL fits my 110 lb Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: The XXL fits my 110 lb Great Dane and is long enough to cover her entire back. Unlike most dog coats, it provides full coverage of her chest past the end of her ribcage. It is very soft and stretchy enough that it doesn't chafe and irritate the skin around the leg holes, which has been an issue with other jackets and I understand a typical point of potential irritation for Great Danes in general. It also stays in place all day and all night! The idea of actually using that hood on her head is ridiculous, but it does drape around her neck to help keep it warm.
customer_reviews.author: Book by its cover

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: My 65 pound Doberman gets cold and shivers so I wanted to get her some sort of sweater or fleece. This one is perfect!! The measurements were pretty accurate too. I definitely recommend (I ordered an XL).
customer_reviews.author: S Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of their return/exchange policy but after ordering another one in XL my dog is very happy. This hoodie is very warm
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the an xxl for my 65lb pitbull but it was way to big. Not a fan of their return/exchange policy but after ordering another one in XL my dog is very happy. This hoodie is very warm, kind of a pain to put on and off as it doesn’t have any zippers or anything, and the hood is way to big even for my pit bulls large head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves the hoodie. I have a pitt bull lab mix and to get it to fit is chest I had to order a size bigger than the rest of his body needed so it baggy but otherwise very nice. The fabric is actually thicker than I expected it to be for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dare2dream16

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality for the price, nice thick fleece
customer_reviews.text: These are really well made for this price! I am pleasantly surprised. I guess time will tell how the fleece holds up where the o-ring is stitched. I originally bought smalls for my two pugs (one at proper weight, one overweight who we just got) and they were just a bit too tight for comfort. I sent them back and ordered mediums, and these fit perfectly. I will say the dimensions of the fleece fit long and not so much wide, so stockier dogs that are overweight might have to size up and deal with the length. I know any longer on my pugs, and we would have trouble with the underbelly being too long.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and warmth for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This fleece jacket appears to be made well and is good quality. It provides good coverage for my little 6.5 lb. toy rat terrier and is comfortable for her to wear and not too hard to get on her (she is not a fan of wearing clothes) but it is cold here often in the winter (we live in the mountains of NC, so not as cold as some places but still drops below freezing in the winter on many winter days). Although not suitable for long extended periods outdoors in the winter, works great for longer periods in the fall weather here and for short bouts outside on colder winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: Deff look into the size chart
customer_reviews.text: Great soft feel and my dog loves it. Sizes are okay, the chest and neck size is exactly what my dog is, but the length was off. The size choices only included based on the chest and neck, not the length. Deff not the right fit for her, but we roll the back part a little bit up and it’s fine. Smaller size wouldn’t have fit her neck and would’ve been too tight on her chest. Good style, Deff look into the size chart and be aware the length will be off if your dog has a big chest but is not long.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great and very worth it
customer_reviews.text: very soft and warm. Size is accurate. Very cute purple color. Will buy in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: True to size and very soft
customer_reviews.text: I got the Purple which was the same shade as in the photos (color is off in my pic). The fleece is super soft and feels warm. My 36lb basset/beagle measures Neck 16" Chest 24.5" Length 18" so after consulting the size chart, I ordered the L which fits her perfectly. The hood is spacious and completely covers her eyes when up. Extra points for the pocket she can't use, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cairns

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT FOR 68LB PIT BULL. GREAT QUALITY.. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old 68lb pit bull male and this hoodie has been by far the best fitting hoodie he has ever had..the fit is perfect and he loves it.. he was outside with me in 40° weather at my storage unit and it kept him warm for a few hours..then I took him home..but GREAT fit and buy..not thin it cheap GREAT material and well worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product! We got a large in purple for our 40lb GSP. It fits well and has held up well in her outside adventures. It’s not too thick, not too thin. And the color is pretty. It’s not gaudy like most dog clothes on the market. And it’s kept her from shaking on brisk days. My only negative is the hood. It’s kinda silly. She got annoyed with it flopping around so I tucked it inside. I’d buy every color if it didn’t have the hood.
customer_reviews.author: LocksByLace

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppies
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, they're a hit! Lol! I got these in the mail yesterday & for dogs that never wear clothes, I'd say they're happy! Molly (purple) is a 45 lb dalmatian/pit mix and Lizzie (red) is a 60 lb lab/pit mix. Molly's is a large, perfect fit. Lizzie's is an xl and it's a little long, but because her chest is wider, a large would have been too small. She doesn't seem to care and it doesnt affect anything.
customer_reviews.author: jbm8179

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my weirdly-shaped dog toasty!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a Dachshund mix dog from down South and she shivers when it drops below 60 degrees. In order to help her survive New England, I purchased this for her and it’s the only dog attire I’ve found so far that fits her strange proportions and keeps her warm! It even covers her whole back! Plus, the price can’t be beat. I wash in cold and hand to dry to prevent shrinking as it is comfortably snug now. I ordered another one in blue to alternate. Will this keep her warm even it’s -15? Probably not. But for chilly fall days, this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: yep, the winner...
customer_reviews.text: in price and quality. very cute and cozy! my kids are all a bit in between though. you can't fit us all!
customer_reviews.author: is

customer_reviews.title: I'd highly recommend for a washable, mid weight fleece product.
customer_reviews.text: A very well made, economically priced fleece sweatshirt ESPECIALLY for large sized breeds. Fits both my Rhodesian Ridgebacks whose body type is very hard to fit and certainly not economically. Easily washes and holding up well. Update 1/1/19. Took this long for one of my rough Ridgebacks to rip it off the other during play. Fortunately, I purchased several spares. Holding up very well. Very warm.
customer_reviews.author: KC Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, accurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I ordered a small and an extra small for my two babies. The sizing is on point. They are actually thicker than I anticipated, which is great! We live in Indiana, so the wind is harsh right now. Both of my dogs seem to be comfy, and they look adorable! I would definitely order these again. So glad I could keep my loves warm on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Flynn

customer_reviews.title: XXL fleece sweater hoodie, not big enough for a great Dane weighing 105 pounds; 38” chest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fleece dog hoodie for my great Dane, she’s approximately 105 pounds. It’s not quite big enough. It fits snug. Her chest girth is 38”. She needs the next size up. I’m disappointed because this should have fit her according to the manufacturers measurements; it does not. It’s difficult to find any dog clothing that will fit great Danes. Other than that it is a well-made sweater. It’s very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kay G

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Doberman perfectly! Hood is a bit of an issue.
customer_reviews.text: Our dobie fits the XL perfectly. She is a bit on the smaller size for a standard Dobie (60-65 pounds) but the XL is just right for her. The hood has a tendency to fall over her eyes which confuses her because she can't get it off once it falls. So, we've tucked it under the body part for now. We may pin it back or even remove it if it continues to be a problem. But, she LOVES it!! She loves wrapping up in her blankets so wearing one is perfect for her. It's warm, fuzzy and stays put. I'd definitely buy again or buy another one that is hoodless.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stop. Won’t stop.
customer_reviews.text: I may need an intervention. I just purchased my FIFTH dog hoodie. These things are the absolute best. S for the 11 pound chihuahua/doxie mix and L for the 45 pound super mutt. Both dogs have rather long bodies, and I love how long these are. Perfect for our frosty New England winters... I have a feeling I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably fits my large-chested boy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the largest size for my male Staffordshire ("Pitbull") Terrier because of his large chest. Easy to put on and take off. Fits comfortably with enough room in the arm pits. He doesn't mind wearing it; he actually seems to enjoy it. Further, since my boy has short fur, and because this sweatshirt is not warm enough for Wyoming Winter weather, I simply layer with his warm Winter coat. Works great. I've purchased another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fleece Jackets!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 boxers. They are both about 75 pounds & the XL fits wonderful. I would say an XL would fit up to 85 or 90 lb dogs. Fleece is very nice and I would say medium weight. Very impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t clean well
customer_reviews.text: Update: I don’t know what happens in the fabric but I’ve thrown both I’ve ordered away after a few months. For some reason they retain a funky smell after washing. I’ve been tried soaking in bleach before washing but the smell was still there. My 60# dog has worn this nearly every day. I wash it often and looks great. I'm ordering another color now. It's easy to get on and off. I ordered and XL.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Rare find for medium to large breeds.
customer_reviews.text: Finding clothing for my Boxer - Pointer mix has been hit or miss. Most brand's "extra large" is too small for her at only 4 months old (13" neck, 23" chest girth, 18" back length) so finding a hoodie that fits her in a Medium that isn't wildly expensive was such a breath of fresh air. Its incredibly soft and she enjoys when I put it on her, as it gives her short coat a bit of extra warmth that she needs in these cold months, not to mention it's CUTE. The price is unbeatable for the quality, I'll absolutely purchase the next size up when she grows out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket found as of yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! I got one for our large dog and 1 each for our two cats during the winter cold. The cats hate wearing anything and usually get out of anything I put them in but these hoodies were really comfortable and warm and all three animals snuggled into them and left them on. The dog actually would ask for his by bringing it to us or pleading and then leading us to his hoodie! I know these are supposed to be for dogs but the fit was perfect for all the animals, just go by the sizing measurements and you and your pet will love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Love The Length On This!
customer_reviews.text: The thing I love most about this hoodie is that it is long enough to completely cover my doggy's back all the way down to her tail. The material is thick and keeps her warm on those brisk early morning and late evening walks at this time of year in Florida (been dropping into the 40's at night). The O ring and the little pocket are very convenient features. The one con about this hoodie is that the opening at the neck is too small. It makes it a bit challenging to get on and off. I still gave it 5 stars nonetheless because it is such a good quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Saharathecat

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is weird.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different sizes, L, XL, and XXL. The difference between each size is very large! The L is a little tight for my 35 LB Border Collie Mix, and the XL is too big for her. The XL is a bit tight for my 65 LB pitty mix (Who is lean) and very tight my other mutt who should be at 70. The XXL is comically big and I love putting it on my other mutt. I'd say the L is good for a 20-35 lb dog, the XL for 45-55, and the XXL is good for 80-100 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Iznvm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hoodie, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have a nearly 100lb Doberman that I bought an XL for, the fit is perfect! The hood is actually functional and fits over her head. She stays nice and warm and loves getting dressed to go outside. She is between the measurements on the size chart for XL and XXL, I chose the smaller expecting there to be enough stretch to be comfortable and II was right. Had I gone bigger it would likely have been too loose to keep her warm.
customer_reviews.author: PlynnebTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as anticipated based on other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 28# terrier mix. Bought the medium after looking at reviews and pictures. Her neck is 16”, back 18” and chest is 22”. It is pretty snug on her which I wouldn’t mind except that it’s not that easy to get on/off. I may try the large but am afraid it’ll be too long for her. It is very soft and seems very warm. I wish it had a little more stretch in it but it seems like great quality. If your dog is between sized or close to upper limit it may be better to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Laurenb

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would keep my dog warm during walks this winter and I just find that so many of the waterproof coats might keep them dry but don't actually provide any kind of warmth. My dog has a very odd shaped chest, sort of narrow but long, and the material of this is perfect because of how stretchy it is. She doesn't love the hood and refuses the wear it, but it falls back and to the side without bothering her, so we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: mmallia

customer_reviews.title: Would like to see the under neath area a little shorter
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a Rottweiler Labrador mix. His chest measures 38" and his length is 29". The hoodie looks good on him and fits pretty well. My only complaint is that the under neath area of the hoodie needs to be shorter because when he pees he ends up peeing on the hoodie also. I am going to try and shorten it myself instead of returning it because overall I like the look of it and he seems to enjoy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Cute,  warm and functional
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a wide chest and dog sweaters often fit tight. This one fit great, is easy to get on and off and is really warm and comfortable. The pocket is cute but also provides an extra layer of warmth on her back and the hood is cute but functional too. I added a small stitch to the hood to fit my dog better- to cover her ears and not eyes, and it works great to block the blistering cold wind. Will be buying in more colors for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Buckleybookworm

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Is very soft and the pink color was beautiful. This is great garment for the price and you really can't beat it IF you have a dog that doesn't mind you bringing it over their head and stuffing their legs in. Mine. Not so much. I'm not returning because it was my fault that I didn't notice this and it was so inexpensive that maybe I can give to a friend or shelter.
customer_reviews.author: SherryKing

customer_reviews.title: XL fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit my lab German Shepard Pit mix just perfect. Has more of the lab body. But still 85 lbs. Even fit my bf's Pit Mastiff mix who is beefier but shorter. Not too loose not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: JeepHairDontCare

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many dog sweaters in my pup's days. This is by far my favorite! It is such great quality! I love that it has a leash loop. I was skeptical about using it before I received the sweater but it is such quality fabric and so well made that it totally doubles as a harness. Super warm too! I will be buying one of every color for him and with prices and quality this good all my doggo friends will be warm this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Ariyah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My terrier she’s 52lbs I bought her a large and it fits her perfectly! She loves them too! She doesn’t want me to take it off, so because of that I did buy 3 of them in different colors! Now I can switch them out. Especially with the cooler months coming in New England she won’t go outside when it’s cold unless she has her sweatshirt on.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Neubert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match size given and no d ring
customer_reviews.text: Too big and missing the ring on the back. I measured but it didn’t match up. This was way too long on her. I ordered the xxl and the xl. Xl was too small. Xxl way to big.
customer_reviews.author: Astro bell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the pooch warm
customer_reviews.text: Nyla enjoys this coat. When I put it on her, she curled up and didn’t bother us to remove it. Now when I put it on her she runs to the door. This is the third coat I’ve ordered for her from different companies. This is the only one that fit her. It’s rather long on the back end, so I just tuck it under and off we go. Thank you for the sizes you offer.
customer_reviews.author: Lady V

customer_reviews.title: Thick and warm but hard to get on/off
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but hard to get on and off. There are no fasteners so you have to pull the dogs front legs thru which is tight. Would be better to have some velcro for easy on and off especially older dogs with arthritis. Also a bit too long so for boy dogs may get in the way when relieving themselves. I'm going to modify mine because my dog does like it.
customer_reviews.author: SulliRam67

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this $11 hoodie! The fleece is not too thick, but not too thin. It fits my dog snugly, but not tightly. It's very well-made, and the stitching seems sturdy. As soon as I put it on my dog, he ran outside and vigorously rolled around in a pile of mulch, and the hoodie took it like a champ. It's also true to size. It's too early to tell if pilling will be a problem; but if it is, I'll just buy another one at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great little Pup hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 24lb, 7month old French bully - size Medium...fits him great. It's as long as his body - the end goes over his butt (his daddy wanted something that would cover his entire body, and this does that job. Just beware if you take your dog out and he needs to #2 - be sure you remember to pull it from over your pups tail so s/he doesn't crap on the back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% yes
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my favorite pet outfit. Our boxer is elderly & anemic so he's always cold. He LOVES this sweater! It seems well made and has been through 3 washings already. I'm ordering another to swap out. I think we are seeing less hair everywhere also. The xl fits my 70 lbs boxer perfectly. The pockets are ridiculous & hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cold CLE weather!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 year old about 75-80lbs Doberman, my baby Eva pictured here. She is ALWAYS freezing in the winter months in Cleveland Ohio. She LOVES this thing!! Literally gets mad when I take it off to wash it. The fit could be better for her particular shape, dobies have a larger chest and really skinny back end/butt. It is also too large (long) on her by just a little bit. I ordered largest size 2xl I think She's hard to find clothes for though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Teichman

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect but the red color bleeds the first time you wash it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the x-large.... fits our 62 pound deep chested somewhat long bodied dog great! I think I measured her 30 long and 30 around her chest...Because the fabric gives some it was easy to get her into it.. I was a little afraid at first look... but no worries... It did have a funny smell, so I (thankfully) HAND washed it.... and the red bled pretty bad.... Good thing I didn't throw it in with other clothes! ;) However.... it is soft.... its fits her perfect.... and she loves it... so all is well! :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small.
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart, this should be loose on the body part of our dog. But it fits very snug. If she grows much at all, she won't be able to wear it. Just be aware this runs small and order a larger size even though it may be too big on the size chart . The sweatshirt is extremely soft and easy to put on/off.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hanford

customer_reviews.title: Nice Material, Very Soft, Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft! Made well and is a nice soft fleece material that doesn't pick up every little piece of lint like most cheap fleece does. I've washed it a handful of times now and it's still looks brand new. I also love that it has a leash clasp already attached so all you have to do is clip your leash to it and go.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeky1229

customer_reviews.title: item runs small
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions were not accurate. I measured my dog and ordered a large. It was Too small. I had to return it and repurchase the xlarge. For the first time ever I had to pay shipping to return the sweater. I wont make that mistake again. I was disappointed as a prime member that returns on some products are not postage paid. This was an eye opened for me
customer_reviews.author: homme

customer_reviews.title: Not for shedders
customer_reviews.text: Very tight even it being the largest I could get. If your dog is a shedder like mine, I’d avoid it. Fur gets stuck all over. Almost weaved in
customer_reviews.author: Kathleenholt203

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on my deep chested dog.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a coat for my deep chested dog. He's a 60 lb American Bulldog/Plott Hound mix. This coat in XL fit him perfectly. It's easy to get on and off. I'm not a "dress up your dog" type person but he's getting older and at 13.5 years old and a polar vortex happening, he needed a bit more protection. This fits the bill. After putting it on him a few times, he now comes running over when I call his name and hold up the jacket. Quality is great for the price and it's fairly water repellent. I'll be buying more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Ok the sizing is a bit goofy. Both my dogs (bichon and a mini poodle) both have a size medium. (Usually they wear smalls) They’re both around 15lbs but built very different, it fits them both great. Little big on the arm holes but it’s long enough to cover almost their entire bodies which is great considering it’s be an extremely harsh winter (in the negatives in MI). These keep them super warm and it’s great that there is a leash hook on the outside of the hoodie as well. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: jacksona241

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a 65+ lbs dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL gray fleece hoodie for my 65+ lbs brown lab and it fit him just right. It's easy to put over his head and then slip his arms through the arm holes. The hood goes over his head too. He enjoys wearing it - it's not tight or uncomfortable. Buy a larger size just to be safe in case your dog's measurement is right in the middle of two sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Barr311

customer_reviews.title: PHOTOSHOOT!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve repeatedly gone back to this affordable and well made hoodie for the pups. They’re perfect. A little stretchy, which makes them easy to put on/take off... but they do stretch out permanently over time. Pics are of: a 42lb American Bully wearing Large. 15-20lb chaweenie wearing small.
customer_reviews.author: ManShopper

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly sweater for a snuggly pup
customer_reviews.text: So soft and cozy, my pup loves it! I ordered a size larger than I needed because my little guy has a long torso, and the length was perfect. He is a 15 pound terrier mix (his measurements - Neck 12", Chest 18", Length 19") and I ordered a size Medium. I am going to have to shorten the bottom a bit so it clears his business, but other than that the fit is great. The color is a much lighter blue than pictured, which I didn't mind, but somebody else might. I would definitely recommend, it is going to keep him snuggly warm in the winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C

customer_reviews.title: One size up would be prefect, if they had a XXL.
customer_reviews.text: If they had 1 size up it would be prefect. I got this because it had the best stomach coverage. My female Great Dane is small for her breed and it’s a little tight but fits her body shape correct if it was bigger. If you measure assume the numbers are the size of the shirt so you have to go one size up. XL is probably good only to 100lb depending on breed.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: 5 lb chihuahua and it fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5.5 lb chihuahua and it fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: bridget braun

customer_reviews.title: Very soft. But too long for my broad chested Pitt.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely soft. But way to long for my pitt. I had to order the largest size to get it to fit across her chest. (She was right at the cutoff for a size smaller.) I solved the problem with the length by folding it underneath (almost completely in half) and pinning/sewing it together. She loves it though. Finally got her something that's not too tight and the Velcro doesn't get pulled apart when she goes through our extra large doggie door. Love how soft it was, even before washing it!!! Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy. Normally Henry doesn’t like to wear clothes, but he seems to like this! I had to get a bigger size to get the needed chest girth and it’s a bit long on the dog, but its just extra butt covering which is great if he’s out playing in the snow. For the price, you can’t beat it for bigger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: petey pablo

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a 20in chest, so I ordered her a medium based on the size chart. It fits her tight. Definitely size up. Other than the sizing issue it's super cute, but incorrect size charts REALLY irritate me because I have to make a special trip to return the item and then waste more time reordering the item in the correct size hence the two star review.
customer_reviews.author: chrysynthia2

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my short-haired border collie. We live in Oklahoma so I didn’t want a jacket that was too heavy- this is perfect! A bit long, but fits his chest area perfectly- he weighs 50lbs. Isn’t in the way while he’s going potty, which is important! Doesn’t have the metal ring for a leash, however it has a small hole for accessing his collar which gives better control. My doggie loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Warm and well-made.
customer_reviews.text: Originally we bought an extra large we goofed it was too big so we got the large one and it fits perfectly on our border collie, we take their coats down in the summertime and sometimes into the fall and this hoodie is well-made and warm also fairly easy to put on we have had several types of dog sweaters I think I like this one the best. In the picture we have the hood rolled back.
customer_reviews.author: Der Vunterkint

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Especially for Big Dog sizes
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the XL a BIT disappointed which is why i didn't give 5stars .. from the picture on the page i expected this to have sweatshirt material with fleece on the inside or atleast a really Thick fleece ,but What you get is a ''Very thin'' Fleece that looks like the wind can blow through it hence Not something that would keep your pet very warm,i only kept because i needed something fast for my big dog(Pitbull) who has Cancer for comfort(Inside)
customer_reviews.author: Bells

customer_reviews.title: Love this product l! One small complaint.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this product fits my pups. Flattering, doesn’t need to be rolled or removed when they go out to potty and it’s soft. My only complaint would be that the fleece builds up static electricity very easy. So many times my dogs end up itching and we have to take them off to give them a break.
customer_reviews.author: krnko11

customer_reviews.title: Good for long bodied dogs
customer_reviews.text: Thick fleece. Cut well for long bodied dog. We have chiweagles and it is hard to find clothes long enough without being to big around but these are perfect for them. Great value for the price. Our dogs are 15# and they wear a medium. These are not a good fit for a stocky build dog like a Pug.
customer_reviews.author: L4ne

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: If you normally size up for your dog, don’t do it this time - the fleece is stretchy and it gets looser as it is worn. That being said, this is a great quality sweater and it keeps my dog from shivering. It has good belly coverage and the hood actually fits my long necked dog (a rarity). I only wish it had sleeves!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Rue is very happy to wear this when it is cold
customer_reviews.text: My staffy and beagle dog weighs about 60 pounds and is fairly long.. I bought the extra large one for her and was worried it would be too big. It fits nicely and she seems to like it a lot too on cold days. It is very well made and covers her tailend and tummy well. Everything else I have bought for her fell short . So my Rue and I give this a 5 star rating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hood is ridiculously large
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping this because it fits my dog well. The 1 issue is that the hood is exceptionally large. It will come forward and cover his whole head so he cannot see. I'm working in finding a way to secure it back. He has many hoodies and this is the only one with such a crazy big hood.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but ill fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Got one in XL (purple) and one XXL (blue) for my pitties. One is bigger than the other so I got him the XXL. It's way too big, but the XL is too small. Also, they are supposed to be able to pee freely in them. Although the purple one fit well, it's too long and he still peed all over the front of it. They were able to play, but the larger one was sagging and got in the way. Overall, they served their purpose. Will probably order something different.
customer_reviews.author: DMKCMagic

customer_reviews.title: Tried Again to Fit it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar hoodie and used the measurements from another seller, but it was way too small. I tried a different seller, using the measurement guide provided, but now it's too big. I have no clue how to better suggest how to measure....but, rather be big than too small.........
customer_reviews.author: KatKobe

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorite hoodie's that my dog wears. Fits well and looks handsome on my Bubby. Has nice stretch and looks comfy, he doesn't mind wearing it and seems to fit true to the sizing chart. Washes well and was easy to put on. I loved the first one I purchased so much that I bought two. Wish they would come out with a sweatshirt fabric in the same style/pattern.
customer_reviews.author: acdoozie

customer_reviews.title: My Boxer likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty big 75 lbs. Boxer, and this fits her almost perfectly! It's a little tight around her chest (she is really wide/big), but it fits snug and even stretches a little. She even likes the hood, it helps her sleep a little better when she is taking a nap during the day. The only bad thing about this hoodie, it trying to get it ON my boxer. It's a little snug, best way I found to put it on is just like a t-shirt while folding her up a little, but she doesn't mind. Getting it off is a lot easier. All in all, nice goodie that fits great and my dog likes to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Too Small !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to the chart and it was way too small Also it is a one piece design so you will have to pull the whole thing over the head, making it kindly difficult to put the legs through the legholes with the one piece design. Nice soft fabric appears to be well-made
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: XXL sweater
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XXL sweater for both my female and male Grate Dane she has a 34'' deep chest and it fits her super well. shes on the smaller side compared to my male Dane who has a 38'' deep chest and his fits although is a bit snug and a tad difficult to put on. The arm holes and neck are big enough to not to worry about the fabric cutting into the armpits nor getting chocked out. overall i am super happy with my purchase glad i could find an affordable sweater for my big babies. p.s they love the sweaters, yes even the female shes just got one of those resting worrisome faces. <3
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Eldred

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a huge fan of these. Sizes seem off. We got an XL for 65lb our lab. Was very long, hanging off of his butt. The hood is also huge. But it’s very very VERY tight on the chest. You can tell it’s uncomfortable for the dog because of how much it digs into their armpits.
customer_reviews.author: jbone

customer_reviews.title: Bundled up together
customer_reviews.text: My sweet girl loves putting her hoodie on just like mom lol it is warm and comfy and stays out of her way while she does her business outside ;) she also gets a little extra skip in her step because she knows how adorable she looks :) thank you for a cool and warm product!!
customer_reviews.author: c. l.

product_meta.title: EXPAWLORER Fleece Dog Hoodies with Pocket, Cold Weather Spring Vest Sweatshirt with O-Ring
feature_bullets: Multiple Selections: 6 sizes (XS,S,M,L,XL,XXL) and 6 colors (Gray,Light Pink,Purple,Blue,Red,Black) for your more choices. Please check the size carefully before purchasing.
Premium Quality: Our hoody is well made of 100% polyester polar fleece material, which is super soft and warm, and can protect your furry friend from the cold weather.
O-Ring/Hole Design: The O-ring attached on the back can be connected to a leash, and it is recommended to wear a collar then through the leash hole for the large dogs.
Pouch Pocket: There is a lovely small pocket on the back of the coat, and you can put some snacks or waste bags in this pocket for your puppy when you have outdoor activities.
Various Applications: It is perfect for dairy wear, photos, outdoors, parties and formal occasions, which can be used as ordinary dress and nightclothes as well.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
